remarks: Properties of greatest lower bound of a poset.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Oct-2011.)  (Revised by NM, 7-Sep-2018.)
statement:
lubprop.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lubprop.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lubprop.u $e |- U = ( lub ` K ) $.
lubprop.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
lubprop.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. dom U ) $.
lubprop $p |- ( ph -> ( A. y e. S y .<_ ( U ` S ) /\ A. z e. B ( A. y e. S y .<_ z -> ( U ` S ) .<_ z ) ) ) $.
$d .<_ y $.
$d B z $.
$d K y z $.
$d S y z $.
$d U y z $.
